DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Treatment Regimen Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable related to a person having completed a prior therapy regimen as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Treatment Regimen Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having completed a prior therapy regimen as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Prior Treatment Regimen Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior therapy completed >=4 w
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior therapy completed >=4 weeks prior to enrollment on protocol (at least six weeks out from nitrosoureas and mitomycin C) and associated toxicities resolved to eligibility levels.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description:
Pre-treatment requirements:
a.	<=2 prior hormonal treatments in any setting
Note: For premenopausal patients prior therapy must have included tamoxifen.
Note: For postmenopausal patients prior therapy must have included an aromatase inhibitor (AI).
b.	No prior chemotherapy for metastatic disease.
Note: Prior chemotherapy allowed in neoadjuvant and/or adjuvant setting only.
c.	No prior lung radiation therapy.
Note: Chest wall radiation for breast cancer is allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all therapy with nitrosoureas or Mitomycin been discontinued for at least six weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with ibrutinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive prior treatment with imetelstat?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive > 2 prior chemotherapy regimens?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with any cytotoxic chemotherapy for either the current diagnosis of T-ALL, T-LLy or for any cancer diagnosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any prior chemotherapy (excluding steroids) and/or radiation therapy prior to this enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior use of ibrutinib

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed prior therapy with nitrosoureas at least 6 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a prior history of T-LBL/T-ALL?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text _1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has hormonal therapy been completed at least 3 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text _2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has hormonal therapy been completed at least 3 weeks prior to Step 1 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient complete appropriate institutional neoadjuvant chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1804
ReferenceDocuments.description: >= 6 months post-potentially curative cancer treatment for breast, prostate, colorectal, or endometrial cancers or Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas. Ongoing hormonal therapies such as tamoxifen, aromatase inhibitors, or androgen deprivation are allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was hormone therapy discontinued at least 28 days prior to enrolment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF-1805CD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Completed chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy (with or without surgery) for head and neck squamous cell carcinoma <= 6 months prior to enrollment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have completed treatment with a platinum agent, taxane, vinca alkaloid, or bortezomib at least 3 months prior to registration. (See Appendix 1 for a list of drugs included in these drug classes).
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have completed treatment with a platinum agent, taxane, vinca alkaloid, or bortezomib at least 3 months prior to registration. (See Appendix 1 for a list of drugs included in these drug classes).

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient completed curative therapy (surgery and/or radiation and/or chemotherapy) within past 12 months at a COG institution?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was hormone therapy discontinued within 2 weeks of study registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF-1901 v3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients who are no longer receiving anticancer therapy must be <= 5 years since the completion of their anticancer therapy (e.g., time since the last day of chemotherapy administration, time since last day of radiotherapy, etc.).

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF-1805CDv2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Completed chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy (with or without surgery) for head and neck squamous cell carcinoma <= 12 months prior to enrollment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any prior chemotherapy (excluding steroids) and/or radiation therapy for rhabdomyosarcoma prior to this enrollment?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any prior chemotherapy (excluding steroids) and/or radiation therapy for rhabdomyosarcoma prior to this enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed 6 weeks of placebo treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed prior therapy with nitrosoureas at least 6 weeks prior to Step 2 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Chemotherapy for non-metastatic disease (e.g., adjuvant therapy) or immunotherapy for locally advanced Stage III disease

ReferenceDocuments.name: Completed chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy (with or without surgery) with curative intent for head and neck squamous cell carcinoma <= 24 months prior to designated clinician visit.
ReferenceDocuments.description: Completed chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy (with or without surgery) with curative intent for head and neck squamous cell carcinoma <= 24 months prior to designated clinician visit.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient receive prior chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy for cancer prior to enrollment?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive prior chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy for cancer prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF text 05
ReferenceDocuments.description: Within 12 months before the planned initial COVID-19 vaccine dose, has patient received one of the cancer treatments?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior to the initial planned COVID-19 vaccine dose, is the patient undergoing or has the patient previously received one of the cancer treatments within the past 12 months?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1804CD-AH-HA
ReferenceDocuments.description: Greater than or equal to 6 months post-potentially curative cancer treatment for breast, prostate, colorectal, or endometrial cancers or Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas.  Ongoing hormonal therapies such as tamoxifen, aromatase inhibitors (with or without adjuvant CDK 4/6 inhibitors such as abemaciclib), or androgen deprivation are allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has prior therapy been completed at least four weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior chemotherapy for non-metastatic disease (e.g., adjuvant therapy) for locally advanced Stage III disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient undergoing or has the patient previously received one of the cancer treatments within the 12 months before their first COVID-19 vaccine dose?
